description.narrative: Partech Africa intends to focus on early-stage growth funding, providing EUR500,000 to EUR5 million initial tickets to talented African teams that are using tech to address large emerging market opportunities. Partech Africa is a generalist tech fund with target industries ranging from fintech to online and mobile consumer services, as well as mobility, supply chain services and digitization of the informal economy.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
